attributes.action: Stop The Energy Companies From Rising The Price Of Gas & Electric To Already Hard It Families.
attributes.additional_details:
We are writing this petition to show how disgusted we are at the rising cost of energy bills. Not only is it going to effect the elderly but hard hit families being effected by the credit crunch. We the undersigned believe that energy prices should be capped so its easier for everyone to heat there home during the coming winter months.


We want the government to act on behalf of the people in this country and stop the Energy companies from raising the cost of energy bills so people in this country are not left to suffer.
